Package main.java.model

Class Hashing

java.lang.Object
main.java.model.Hashing
Direct Known Subclasses:
LoginController, LostPwController, RegistrationController
public abstract class Hashing extends Object
Abstract class containing methods for hashing and validating passwords.
Author:
Leander

      Parameters:
      password - Char-Array containing the plaintext password.
      Returns:
      String containing the hashed password. Information divided by ":"
      Throws:
      NoSuchAlgorithmException

    • validatePassword

      protected static boolean validatePassword(String plaintext, String hashedInfo) throws NoSuchAlgorithmException, InvalidKeySpecException
      Hashes plaintext password and compares it to given hash information to validate if both match.
      Parameters:
      plaintext -
      hashedInfo -
      Returns:
      true if passwords match, false if not.
      Throws:
      NoSuchAlgorithmException
      InvalidKeySpecException
